
                            
                            <p>第一步打开这个网站 <br>  <a href="https://engage.tobii.gg/ambassador-bonanza" target="_blank">https://engage.tobii.gg/ambassador-bonanza</a> <br>  <br> 第二步 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/25/134544p31ztfzr3zxdw3z3.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/25/134544p31ztfzr3zxdw3z3.png"> <br> 拉到下面点那个sign in 蓝色的，随便填一个邮箱，这个没有所谓的，只要记住就好， <br>  <br> 第三步 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/25/134642nydkjjawdozksjwu.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/25/134642nydkjjawdozksjwu.png"> <br> 点下面那个connect twich <br> 绑定你的老鼠台账号，没有就注册一个，选邮箱注册就好，简单方便 <br>  <br> 第四步 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/25/134721ja6bp2pzl8a32by0.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/25/134721ja6bp2pzl8a32by0.png"> <br> 点一下那个star,把他变成next <br>  <br> 显示这个就是完成了 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/25/134757tkk7iirmexlyinr5.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/25/134757tkk7iirmexlyinr5.png"> <br>  <br> 然后下面那个框应该就开始播直播了，这样就算完成了，记得不要静音 <br> 可以点开多一个这个，这样好像时长增加会快一点 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/25/135002uvvz2w11qn3039q3.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/25/135002uvvz2w11qn3039q3.png"> <br> 记得点左上角是红色live那种 <br>  <br> 尽力了，这都看不懂不愿动手的就不要参加这个活动了 <br> 这个活动每年都会搞一次的，多号多挂，注册号的成本接近于0 <br>  <br>  <br>  </p>
